question_stem.en: A study is conducted to estimate the prevalence of catheter-associated urinary tract infection (CAUTI) in the intensive care unit (ICU) of an urban hospital. The plot below shows the number of cases of CAUTI in this hospital during the month of July among patients in the ICU. Based on the plot, which of the following is the number of prevalent cases on July 31?
question_stem.zh: 一项研究旨在评估一家城市医院重症监护病房（ICU）中导管相关性尿路感染（CAUTI）的患病率。下图显示了该医院在7月份ICU患者中CAUTI的病例数。根据该图，以下哪项是7月31日的现患病例数？

question.en: Based on the plot, which of the following is the number of prevalent cases on July 31?
question.zh: 根据该图，以下哪项是7月31日的现患病例数？

explanation.en: Point prevalence refers to the number of DISEASE CASES that are active at a SPECIFIC POINT in time (eg, July 31) divided by the number of people in the at-risk population. In this example, a study determined the number of cases of catheter-associated urinary tract infection (CAUTI) among patients in the intensive care unit during the month of July. There were 9 cases of CAUTI in July; a tenth case developed after July 31. Four of the 9 patients recovered before July 31; therefore, the number of cases of CAUTI still active on July 31 was 5.
explanation.zh: 现患率是指在特定时间点（例如，7月31日）活跃的疾病病例数除以处于风险中的人群总数。在本例中，一项研究确定了7月份重症监护病房中导管相关性尿路感染（CAUTI）患者的病例数。7月份共有9例CAUTI病例；第10例发生在7月31日之后。9名患者中有4名在7月31日之前康复；因此，7月31日仍然活跃的CAUTI病例数为5。

summary.en: 1) Point prevalence 2) Count the number of active cases on July 31
summary.zh: 1) 现患率 2) 计算7月31日活跃病例数

tags: Point prevalence; CAUTI; Urinary tract infection; Epidemiology
